name: SWAT Shooter Mission
description:
Do you like first-person shooter? If so, then you will love this modern action commando FPS game, which is a new simulation of the war experience.

There are many, interesting and challenging missions in the game.
Eliminate the terrorists that dive into your country. And confront the terrorist forces.
With the help of special forces, use your fighting skills, destroy all enemies, and conquer the enemy's base, save the trapped civilians.

As a special forces commando officer, you received a secret task, with a gun to clean up a remote enemy camp. On the battlefield to destroy all the terrorists, destroy the enemy's armed camp.

The game offers a range of weapons for you to choose from.
Every weapon is consistent with reality, and perfect interaction with all the weapons. You can enter the game, choose your favorite weapon, and upgrade it. And pick up your weapons, destroy the enemy.

The city is suffering from the destruction of terrorists, you must stop them as soon as possible, destroy all the terrorists, destroy their strongholds. Of course you have to be careful of your enemies, they have been aware of your presence. You must use the fastest speed to destroy the enemy, while ensuring their own safety. Use your excellent combat skills and shooting ability to complete the task.


SWAT Shooter Mission Features:
- great military action FPS game
- a variety of powerful weapons
- High quality graphics
- Real music and sound effects
- realistic city environment
- Simple mode of operation
